description: FSM modeling the interactive behavior of a minimal Stack web app where a single button invokes myFunction() and updates the #stack container.
notes: Only DOM selectors present in the HTML were used. The single interactive element is the <button onclick="myFunction()"> which triggers myFunction(); the stack display is the element with id="#stack". States model the lifecycle: idle -> handlingClick (myFunction called) -> updatingStack (DOM render) -> idle; errors surface to the error state and can be retried by clicking the button again.
